snippet.title: Spirit of Shotgun - Main Trailer
snippet.description:
Spirit of Shotgun is an upcoming title in the hardcore no-checkpoint  platformer genre.

Become the chosen one - a man with a shotgun, stuck inside a living wooden barrel - and complete the grueling climb from the very bowels of the earth. Will you bring back sunlight to the surface, or will you give up before the task is done?

Test your faith, come in March 2022.

Wishlist us on → https://store.steampowered.com/app/1910230
Follow → https://twitter.com/veverstudios for updates on a closer release date and future game features.

Trailer → https://www.instagram.com/somekindofsamuel/

Vever is a two-man independent studio, with Spirit of Shotgun being it's first major project. See you in the Underdark.
